body:
Comment 2: 
Thanks for the report. If you submit a CL (change list), it is likely to get submitted,
but I don't think anyone is actively maintaining go.exp/inotify anymore. See
https://golang.org/doc/contribute.html to get started.

Regarding fsnotify, I've started to pull a part the code to have a layer wrapping
syscall and another that builds on that. So far I've only done this with kqueue, adding
functions like kqueue(), register(), read() and a durationToTimespec() helper. It isn't
a separate package yet with an exported API, but that's something I have been thinking
about.

https://github.com/go-fsnotify/fsnotify
